User’s Guide¶

This manual is written for users who are interested in using components of simulations provided by the Deterministic6G. (In contrast, if you are interested in modifying INET’s components or plan to extend INET with new protocols or other components using C++, we recommend the Deterministic6G Developer’s Guide.)
